#

#Production Methods
    # Time Period   Productivity                            Value per worker (approx)
    # 1700          $ 1.50 - Peasants (x1)                  $ 1.00
    # 1800          $ 2.00 - Laborers or higher (x2)        $ 4.00
    # 1850          $ 3.00                                  $ 10.00
    # 1900          $ 5.00 - Workers or higher (x5)         $ 25.00
    # 1950          $ 8.00                                  $ 65.00
    # 2000          $ 10.00 - Professionals or higher (x10) $ 100.00
    # 2050          $ 12.00 - Specialists only (x20)        $ 240.00
    
    # Time Period   I Prod      II Prod     III Prod    IV Prod     % Input     % Rev
    # 1500          $  1.5      $  1.7      $  2.0      $  2.3      20          80
    # 1750          $  2.0      $  2.3      $  2.7      $  3.0      25          75
    # 1850          $  2.7      $  3.0      $  3.6      $  4.1      30          70 
    # 1900          $  3.6      $  4.2      $  4.8      $  5.4      35          65
    # 1950          $  4.8      $  5.5      $  6.3      $  7.2      40          60
    # 2000          $  6.3      $  7.3      $  8.5      $  9.5      45          55
    # 2050          $  8.5      $  9.6      $ 11.3      $ 12.8      50          50
    
    # I - Agriculture, Mining, Logging
    # II - Consumer Goods, Textiles, Plastics, Chemicals, Urban Center, Entertainment Hub, Early Steel, Synthetic Oil/Rubber/Fiber
    # III - Batteries, Tools, Electronics, Appliances, Power Plant, Oil, Late Steel
    # IV - Vehicles, Machinery, Computers
    
	# Country Total = Resource Eff. Modifier * ( (Additional Resources + State Production) * Infrastructure Bonus * Local Resources Modifier + Temporary Resources - Resource Cost )
	# State resource@token does NOT get modified by modifier@local_resources, but DOES get modified by additional resources & resource cost
	# resource@token = (Base + Additional Resources) * Infra - Resource Cost
	# Base = (resource@token + Resource Cost) / Infra - Additional Resources

    # Infrastructure (Services, small amount of Industrial Cap)
    # Railway (Services, Industrial Cap)
    # Port (Services, Shipping Cap)

    # Subsistence Farm (Mostly Food, small amount of Wood and Fibers)
    # Crop Farm (Food)
    # Rice Paddy (Food)
    # Livestock Ranch (Food, Small amount of Fiber & Luxuries)
    # Luxuries Plantation (Luxuries)

    # Steel Mill (Steel)
    # Machinery Factory (Machinery)
    # Chemical Plant (Chemicals)
    # Plastics Plant (Plastics)
    # Composites Manufactory (Composites)
    # Electronics Factory (Electronics)
    # Battery Plant (Portable Power Sources)
    # Robotics Plant (Robots)

    # Consumer Goods Factory (Consumer Goods)
    # Textile Mill (Textiles)
    # Appliance Factory (Appliances)
    # Vehicle Plant (Vehicles)
    # Computer Assembly (Computers)
    # Power Plant (Electricity)
    # Urban Center (Services)
    # Entertainment Hub (Entertainment)

    # What NEEDS to be displayed:
    #   

    # Note that base employment is determined by BASE OUTPUT * BASE PRICE / 2

    # INFRASTRUCTURE
        # Production (Infrastructure)
        # define_pm_dirt_paths
        # define_pm_gravel_roads
        # define_pm_paved_roads
        # define_pm_highways
        # define_pm_motorways

        # Production (Railway)
        # define_pm_steam_locomotives
        # define_pm_diesel_locomotives
        # define_pm_electric_locomotives
        # define_pm_high_speed_rail
        # define_pm_maglev_rail

        # Automation (Railway)
        # define_pm_no_automation
        # define_pm_semaphores (1842)
        # define_pm_color_light_signals (1904)
        # define_pm_rail_computerization (1961)
        # define_pm_rail_automation
        
        # Production (Port)
        # define_pm_anchorage
        # define_pm_cargo_port
        # define_pm_industrial_port
        # define_pm_container_port
        # define_pm_smart_port

    #

    # LOGGING
        # Applies to Wood

        # Production
        define_pm_simple_forestry = {  # 1500
            set_variable = { global.pm_output_multiplier@token:pm_simple_forestry = 1.5 } # +1.5
            
            set_variable = { global.pm_construction_duration@token:pm_simple_forestry = 12 } # -18
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_simple_forestry
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_simple_forestry
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_simple_forestry = token:wood }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_simple_forestry = 1.0 } # -1.0
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_simple_forestry = token:tools }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_simple_forestry = 0.5 } # -0.5
            
            set_variable = { global.pm_retooling_duration@token:pm_simple_forestry = 6 } # 0

            # per resource / base price
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_laborers@token:pm_simple_forestry = 1.00 } # x1.0 = 1.0 peasant wages
            
            # Profit: 1.5 (1.5)
        }
        define_pm_saw_mills = {  # 1800
            set_variable = { global.pm_tech_unlock@token:pm_saw_mills = token:manufactories }
            set_variable = { global.pm_output_multiplier@token:pm_saw_mills = 3.0 } # +3.0
            
            set_variable = { global.pm_construction_duration@token:pm_saw_mills = 18 } # -63
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_saw_mills
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_saw_mills
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_saw_mills = token:wood }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_saw_mills = 1.5 } # -1.5
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_saw_mills = token:tools }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_saw_mills = 1.0 } # -1.0
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_saw_mills = token:machinery }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_saw_mills = 1.0 } # -1.0
            
            set_variable = { global.pm_retooling_duration@token:pm_saw_mills = 9 } # -8.1
            
            # per resource / base price
            clear_array = global.pm_input@token:pm_saw_mills
            clear_array = global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_saw_mills
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_saw_mills = token:machinery }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_saw_mills = 0.3 } # -0.3
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_saw_mills = token:tools }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_saw_mills = 0.5 } # -0.5

            # per resource / base price
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_laborers@token:pm_saw_mills = 0.9 } # x1.0 = 0.9 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_workers@token:pm_saw_mills = 0.1 } # x2.5 = 0.25 peasant wages
            
            # Profit: 2.2 (1.91)
        }
        define_pm_chainsaws = {  # 1930
            set_variable = { global.pm_tech_unlock@token:pm_chainsaws = token:industrial_era_tools_7 }
            set_variable = { global.pm_output_multiplier@token:pm_chainsaws = 11.0 }
            
            set_variable = { global.pm_construction_duration@token:pm_chainsaws = 24 } # -216
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_chainsaws
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_chainsaws
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_chainsaws = token:wood }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_chainsaws = 2.5 } # -2.5
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_chainsaws = token:tools }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_chainsaws = 3.0 } # -3.0
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_chainsaws = token:machinery }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_chainsaws = 2.0 } # -2.0
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_chainsaws = token:oil }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_chainsaws = 1.5 } # -1.5
            
            set_variable = { global.pm_retooling_duration@token:pm_chainsaws = 12 } # -24
            
            # per resource / base price
            clear_array = global.pm_input@token:pm_chainsaws
            clear_array = global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_chainsaws
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_chainsaws = token:tools }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_chainsaws = 1.0 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_chainsaws = token:machinery }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_chainsaws = 1.0 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_chainsaws = token:oil }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_chainsaws = 1.0 }

            # per resource / base price

            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_laborers@token:pm_petrochemicals = 0.5 } # x1.0 = 0.5 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_workers@token:pm_petrochemicals = 0.2 } # x2.5 = 0.5 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_professionals@token:pm_petrochemicals = 0.2 } # x5.0 = 1.0 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_specialists@token:pm_petrochemicals = 0.1 } # x10.0 = 1.0 peasant wages

            # Profit: 15.3 (5.1)
        }
        
        # Composites Manufactory
        # define_pm_fiberglass - Modern Ceramics (1960)
        # define_pm_nanomaterials - Advanced Ceramics (1985)
        # define_pm_smart_materials - Advanced Ceramics (1985)

        # define_pm_fission_reactor_plant - Atomic Reactors (1950)
        # define_pm_fusion_reactor_plant - Practical Fusion Reactors (2025)

            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_subways = 0.8 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_subways = token:electricity }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_subways = 1.6 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_subways = token:machinery }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_subways = 1.0 }

            # per resource / base price
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_laborers@token:pm_subways = -0.5 } # x1.0 = -0.5 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_workers@token:pm_subways = -0.2 } # x2.5 = -0.5 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_professionals@token:pm_subways = 0.05 } # x2.5 = 0.25 peasant wages

            # Profit: -3.4 (break-even when wage > 4.53 )
        }
        define_pm_airports = {  # 1960
            set_variable = { global.pm_tech_unlock@token:pm_airports = token:transformer }

            set_variable = { global.pm_construction_duration@token:pm_airports = 3 }
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_airports
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_airports
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_airports = token:wood }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_airports = 0.3 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_airports = token:machinery }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_airports = 0.2 }

            set_variable = { global.pm_retooling_duration@token:pm_airports = 3 }

            # per resource / base price
            clear_array = global.pm_input@token:pm_airports
            clear_array = global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_airports
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_airports = token:electronics }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_airports = 1.0 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_airports = token:electricity }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_airports = 2.0 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_airports = token:machinery }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_airports = 1.0 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_airports = token:vehicles }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_airports = 1.0 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_airports = token:oil }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_airports = 1.0 }

            # per resource / base price
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_laborers@token:pm_airports = -0.5 } # x1.0 = -0.5 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_workers@token:pm_airports = -0.2 } # x2.5 = -0.5 peasant wages

            # Profit: -6.0 (break-even when wage > 6.0 )
        }
        define_pm_integrated_transit_network = {  # 1990

            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_workers@token:pm_integrated_transit_network = -0.2 } # x2.5 = -0.5 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_professionals@token:pm_integrated_transit_network = -0.1 } # x5.0 = -0.5 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_specialists@token:pm_integrated_transit_network = 0.05 } # x5.0 = 0.5 peasant wages

            # Profit: -7.5 (break-even when wage > 7.5 )
        }
        define_pm_smart_city = {  # 2030
            set_variable = { global.pm_tech_unlock@token:pm_smart_city = token:transformer }

            set_variable = { global.pm_construction_duration@token:pm_smart_city = 3 }
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_smart_city
            clear_array = global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_smart_city
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_smart_city = token:wood }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_smart_city = 0.3 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input@token:pm_smart_city = token:machinery }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_construction_input_amount@token:pm_smart_city = 0.2 }

            set_variable = { global.pm_retooling_duration@token:pm_smart_city = 3 }

            # per resource / base price

            clear_array = global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_smart_city
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_smart_city = token:electricity }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_smart_city = 5.5 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_smart_city = token:computers }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_smart_city = 3.0 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_smart_city = token:vehicles }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_smart_city = 1.5 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_smart_city = token:appliances }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_smart_city = 1.0 }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input@token:pm_smart_city = token:machinery }
            add_to_array = { global.pm_input_amount@token:pm_smart_city = 1.0 }

            # per resource / base price
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_laborers@token:pm_smart_city = -0.5 } # x1.0 = -0.5 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_workers@token:pm_smart_city = -0.2 } # x2.5 = -0.5 peasant wages
            set_variable = { global.pm_workforce_professionals@token:pm_smart_city = -0.1 } # x5.0 = -0.5 peasant wages

            # Profit: -12.0 (break-even when wage > 8.0 )
        }
